title: This Is Why Uncle Si Wants a Chevy
description:
Si is amazed by the way a Chevy truck can get you out of an iffy situation. Godwin reveals his secret to a successful marriage, and it makes a lot of scents. Si watches the news and declares the world completely insane. Martin is excited about getting John-David hooked on "Ted Lasso." And the boys tackle dirty entertainment and tricky in-law situations.
-
